SELECT DISTINCT a.country_id, a.country_code, a.country_seo_name, a.country_name_eng, a.country_name_chs, a.country_name_cht, a.img_id FROM t_country a INNER JOIN t_origin b ON a.country_id = b.country_id INNER JOIN t_wine c ON b.wine_origin_id = c.wine_origin_id INNER JOIN t_wine_vintage d ON c.wine_id = d.wine_id INNER JOIN t_product e ON d.wine_id = e.wine_id AND d.vintage_tag = e.vintage_tag WHERE e.supplier_id = #{supplierId} order by a.mic_rank
